mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date) VALUES(seq_product_prod_no.nextval, #{prodName:VARCHAR}, #{prodDetail:VARCHAR}, #{manuDate:DATE}, #{price:INTEGER}, #{fileName:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_no as prod_no, p.prod_name as prod_name, p.prod_detail as prod_detail, p.manufacture_day as manufacture_day, p.price as price, p.image_file as image_file, p.reg_date as reg_date, t.tran_status_code as tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no=t.prod_no (+) AND p.prod_no=#{prodNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET prod_name = #{prodName:VARCHAR}, prod_detail = #{prodDetail:VARCHAR}, manufacture_day = #{manuDate:VARCHAR}, price = #{price:NUMERIC}, image_file = #{fileName:VARCHAR} WHERE prod_no = #{prodNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT p.prod_no as prod_no, p.prod_name as prod_name, p.prod_detail as prod_detail, p.manufacture_day as manufacture_day, p.price as price, p.image_file as image_file, p.reg_date as reg_date, t.tran_status_code as tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no=t.prod_no(+)
AND p.prod_no like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.prod_name like '%${searchKeyword}%'
ORDER BY p.prod_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT p.prod_no as prod_no, p.prod_name as prod_name, p.prod_detail as prod_detail, p.manufacture_day as manufacture_day, p.price as price, p.image_file as image_file, p.reg_date as reg_date, t.tran_status_code as tran_status_code FROM product p, transaction t WHERE p.prod_no=t.prod_no(+)
AND p.prod_no like '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND p.prod_name like '%${searchKeyword}%'
) countTable
